alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 4:54AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Higher totals of 4 to 8 inches near the Lander Foothills. Lesser totals of 2 to 4 inches south of the Owl Creek range near Shoshoni and near Dubois. Winds gusting 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, Wind River Mountains East, Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible as the snow and wind combine to create reduced visibility and drifting.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
